articles.title: The Jose Mourinho texts and broken promises that made Timothy Fosu-Mensah a Man Utd outcast - Mirror Online
articles.description: The versatile defender completed a permanent move to Bayer Leverkusen earlier this week, ending a nine-year association with Manchester United
articles.content:
Timothy Fosu-Mensahs Manchester United departure was hardly front page news by the time it was announced on Wednesday afternoon.
